Statement.Sql: select v.*,f.mName,f.mType,f.mProperties,t.mDisplay,t.mSort,t.mTable as mFTable,t.mFieldId as mFId from FIELD_TABLE t left join FIELD_VALUE v on t.mFieldId=v.mFieldId and v.mTable=? and v.mKey=? and v.mPos=0 and v.mId IN (select max(mId) from FIELD_VALUE group by mKey,mFieldId) left join FIELD f on t.mFieldId=f.mId where t.mTable=?

select v.*,f.mName,f.mType,f.mProperties,t.mDisplay,t.mSort,t.mTable as mFTable,t.mFieldId as mFId from FIELD_TABLE t left join FIELD_VALUE v on t.mFieldId=v.mFieldId and v.mTable=? and v.mKey=? and v.mId IN (select max(mId) from FIELD_VALUE group by mKey,mFieldId,mPos) left join FIELD f on t.mFieldId=f.mId where t.mTable=?
